meanings.definition: A person who installs and repairs pipes and fixtures for water, gas, or sewage systems.
meanings.sent1: The plumber fixed the leaky pipe in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor called a plumber to install a new toilet.
meanings.sent3: Why did the plumber bring a fishing rod to work? To catch pipefish!
meanings.sent4: The plumber's expertise flowed through the house like water through pipes.
meanings.sent5: The plumber's toolbox was like a treasure chest of solutions for plumbing problems.

meanings.sent1: Dad used to plumber before he retired.
meanings.sent2: I will plumber at the new construction site next week.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chef plumber on the weekends? To fix leaky soup pots!
meanings.sent4: She had to plumber her way through the maze of pipes to reach the main valve.
meanings.sent5: The team had to plumber quickly to stop the flooding in the basement.
